caption:
Female founders are the backbone of our communities—they create jobs, inspire innovation, and bring dreams to life 💖 

That’s why my nonprofit, @11.11MediaImpact, is teaming up with @GoFundMe and the Pasadena Women’s Business Center @pcclancer @sbagov to support women-owned small businesses devastated by the LA Fires.

This initiative will provide critical relief and long-term recovery support to businesses facing immense financial and operational challenges. We’re committing $300,000 in grants to help these businesses rebuild, including $25K grants for 11 women-owned businesses and additional funding for expert guidance to over 100 more.

Female business owners who have been impacted by the fires are invited to apply now. The deadline is Friday, March 21st—let’s make sure every deserving founder gets this opportunity. Tag a business owner, share this post, and help spread the word! 💕✨ If you'd like to share your application video on your socials, we’d would love to amplify it! Please use the hashtag #SlivingForSmallBiz

#WomenSupportingWomen #SmallBusinessGrants #1111MediaImpact
